Reviews.Content: It works amazing at outdoors, but struggled with it in dark settings and places like aquarium. Overall decent camera to have.

Reviews.Title: sony CMOS 16.2 MP with 5.x optical zoom
Reviews.Author: bvenkat
Reviews.Content: The camera looks and feels good. It should be the choice for those who would like to capture important moments of their lives and those who cannot afford a DSLR :)

Reviews.Title: Sony DSCWX9
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: This camera shoots very good pictures and seems to be good in low light. The video is very good and looks fluid. The zoom works very good and the resolution of the screen is excellent. The screen picks up finger prints easily and need to be cleaned alot though. The camera shoots quickly and changing functions on the camera are easy and fast. There are a few things that are going to take some time to get use to. I don't care for the scroll on the back to change features as it is too finicky. The battery does not last very long at all and it has to be charged in camera with the included cable. I like charging the battery with a real battery charger and so I had another expense to aquire one. Aside from these few negative aspects I think it is pretty good all in all.

Reviews.Title: best camera for the price
Reviews.Author: K. Li
Reviews.Content: stunning video on back screen. very good performance in low light environment like indoor.Plus the video full hd recording can par with most dvr on the market.Love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: patrick
Reviews.Content: This camera out performs other models at a much cheaper price.  The twilight pictures are amazing.  Video quality is second to none.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I've been using it for about 6 months now, and it's been great. Every feature is useful if you're into that thing. I use it for tons of panoramic shots, and landscapes. It's been fitting the bill for an amateur like myself.

Reviews.Title: lots of camera in a small package
Reviews.Author: luke
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on the purchase of my daughter's Christmas present.  After much research I chose the Sony DSC WX9 because for the size and money Sony knocked this one out of the park.  Read all of the features and you will not find a better deal that is easy to carry and use.I especially like the panarama/landscape feature.  The pictures are great!  Small, reasonably priced, feature packed and a Carl Zeiss lens! WOW is all I can say.

Reviews.Title: Non standard usb
Reviews.Author: Kevin Moran
Reviews.Content: I would be satisfied with this camera though disappointed in it's low light performance except it uses a non standard usb cable. It looks like a micro usb jack but is a little thinner and wider. All non iphone cell phones now use micro usb, it is time for camera makers to stop using proprietary usb cables. Start avoiding buying cameras with proprietary usb cables and the camera makers will come around.

Reviews.Title: You should by it ;)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and very good quality. My favorite part is the panoromic shoot. Try it, you are going to love it ^_^

Reviews.Title: Exellent
Reviews.Author: Daniel Alarcon Cabezas "Daniel A,"
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera, I take very beautiful photos. I purchased also an extra battery to be covered all day.  The sweep panorama is awesome!!!.Even my cousins that have their own digital cameras with them (not the WX9) wanted to take photos with mine during a party!!Recommended, but be careful, the exterior it's made of some kind of plastic.  It's not metalic at all.  I don't know why (maybe to reduce weight, cost)??.  It's a very light item, not much weight.

Reviews.Title: Cybershot
Reviews.Author: J. B. Felix "basketballer"
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera with amazing picture quality. The multiple burst shots came in really hand when taking pictures of Iguassu Falls. It captured the water falling perfectly

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and great price
Reviews.Author: S. Weld "musicman"
Reviews.Content: Nothing bad to say about this camera. Easy to use and the quality of pictures are outstanding. I have been a Kodak Easyshare user since 2002 and I wasn't sure about jumping ship to any type other than Kodak. The price and reviews on this camera got my attention and I am well pleased. Besides buying this camera through Amazon I also purchased an additional battery which was a secondary brand, but it works great. One fully charged battery will give me about 200 pictures.I have one comment to make about the CD software that is used to review pictures; it is a system hog on my laptop and it would run my HD continually and the computer system was showing serious red zones for the chipset  heat index. I use OS XP and I keep my laptop clean and efficient and it is still fast and usable after five years, however, the software given to me on the CD through Sony is a serious system hog and I had to delete it. This is the only issue that I have had and because it is a non-issue with the camera itself, it is irrelevent but I wanted to mention it for others.

Reviews.Title: Great Compact
Reviews.Author: sms
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with my last Cybershot, but after reading the reviews, decided to give this one a try.  It has ben great.  It takes good quality photos in a variety of settings and lightings.  I have it set for Intelligent Auto and don't have to worry about making a bunch of adjustments.  The most important thing to me was taking fast pictures.  With a toddler, there is no stopping and taking a picture, you have to hope for the best and this camera has captured some great shots.  It takes the picture almost as soon as I press the button.  The movies are in HD (a big plus), but I had some trouble finding where they were stored. I found them and now I can download and view them no problem.  If you want a good fast compact camera that you don't have to play with, this is your answer.

Reviews.Title: fantastic camera in small package
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing...it's small but takes great pictures, excellent HD video, panoramic views, and even 3D pictures.  I would highly recommend it to anyone wanting a great camera in a small package and reasonalbe price.

Reviews.Title: SONY CONTINUES TO AMAZE
Reviews.Author: B. Family
Reviews.Content: I Love this camera!The background d-focus feature is amazing. The images are crisp and clear with amazing color clarity. The capture speed is very rapid. This is important when trying to capture that precious moment that otherwise would be lost with a slow shutter speed camera.My only disappointment is that the SD Card Slot is located very close in proximity to the battery. This makes it difficult to eject at times.No regrets with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: W
Reviews.Content: The image quality is nothing but great. It is easy to use and the features are good. This camera is definitely worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: DMM
Reviews.Content: I have a Canon T2i and 40D which I use for professional photography and videos. I bought this Sony digital camera for vacations and snowboarding. The camera is extremely portable, convenient, and packs many useful features that make the photos of very high quality. The images from the camera are some of the best I have seen on a non-DSLR modern camera. Most point and shoot cameras have lousy lenses and take mediocre photos. This camera does no such thing. Great price, great camera. Must have.

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: Manuel Condado
Reviews.Content: Almost having this camera for nearly a year. I purchased it a few days after it was introduced into the market.So I decided to review on it. Originally when it came out it retailed from $200-$220. The camera take high quality pictures both day and night. High/ quick flash. Sony also included a 3d picture mode, which is kinda of useless, unless you have a 3d tv. In terms of video quality with a 32gb on the lowest setting I can get anywhere from about 18 hrs of video. While If i record in 1080 I get anywhere from 1-2 hrs. When recording in HD I recommend buying and carrying a spare battery because it does die fast when recording. I mainly use this camera to record at live concerts. The video quality is nice and crisp but the audio sucks at keeping the bass sounding nice and clear. Bass at times may sound disoriented at times.

Reviews.Title: Sony dx9
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: Great camera, and great crisp pictures for the moneySony DSCWX9/BBDL 16.2 MP CMOS Sensor with 5 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera Bundle Black

Reviews.Title: Surprise gift from my hubby
Reviews.Author: Rachel Marie
Reviews.Content: Husband did good on this little camera. Its small, sleek, has an AMAZING menu and guidebook on the camera, and shoots great.  I spent maybe an hour reading through the menu and playing with the functions, and I was posting pics to Fbook and working on a new craft project to photo journal the next day.

Reviews.Title: great camera, horrible software.
Reviews.Author: A. Hockenberry
Reviews.Content: I would have rated this camera higher if it wasn't so hard to get the photos and videos off of it and onto my Mac (HEY SONY, MAC PEOPLE TAKE PICTURES TOO!)It takes great pictures, the screen is awesome, the panorama is eezy peezy lemon skweezy, and it takes multiple format memory cards.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX9 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens a
Reviews.Author: Luis Marquez
Reviews.Content: Excelent product. The image quality is awsome! I Love it. Now with the Full HD videos, Ihave a High quality videos to share with my friends

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Terges
Reviews.Content: It's an excellent camera. The best I've ever had. It take pictures with a perfect quality even at day or at night and with or without flash. It's incredible!

Reviews.Title: sony cyber shot
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: Sony cyber shot 16.2 megapixels is a great little camera for the price.  Pleased with the pics and its overall performance. The only downside is wheel(personal preference) and the very small on and off button (my husband's fingers are too big)

Reviews.Title: Sony DCS-WX9 Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent compact, low-cost, everyday camera. Allows both very fine manual control of picture qualities or automated hands-free settings (both with and without flash).

Reviews.Title: Excellent results so far
Reviews.Author: KAV
Reviews.Content: I will preface by saying I'm a fan of Sony Cameras and this is my third aside from an older Cyber-Shot and a dSLR. I'm guessing like most, once you find a camera manufacturer and get used to their settings and operation, it is easier to stick with them rather than reading yet another manual. The great thing for me is that once I got hooked on the Sony cameras I was all set because, for the most part, they do take excellent pictures. I have very little interest in the video aspect of this camera so I won't mention it further. I'm totally into still photos and have received many, many compliments on the pictures taken from our travels but credit this 100% to the camera as I have zero training.So if you are like me and you get easily bored with manuals but really want to take high quality shots to hang on your walls or throw in a book, I recommend you try Sony and see what you think. I have also used some Canon and Nikon models but I am sticking with Sony. As for the DSC-WX9, I bought it specifically for a trip to Central America as I didn't want to bring the whole camera bag with me for security reasons (and to pack light for the in-country flights). This camera is compact enough to fit in your pocket and is an easy little point and shoot. I've had excellent luck in lower light situations which can be the achilles tendon of many an amateur and produced some all around excellent photos. My only issue with this camera which isn't even enough to drop it a star is that it's not the quickest to focus and shoot. It's just something you get used to and we're only talking fractions of seconds. Otherwise, for me, it's a typical Sony - easy to use and produces beautiful photos. If you take into account the quality and features along with the price, this little camera would be hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures!
Reviews.Author: F Rector 3
Reviews.Content: This is my second Sony Camera. They really take great pictures. This camera is small, easy to operate, and the pictures are stunning. It performs very well on Auto, but also gives great freedom to the user if you want to make manual changes.

Reviews.Title: I love the Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Cygarbuff
Reviews.Content: I've owned nothing but Sony Cybershots and they just keep getting better which each model. The thing I like about the Cybershot is you can go into a picture you just took and resize, shift, zoom  and adjust and it re crops the image right then and there. No need to do it with software. Just get the image as you can center and perfect  it afterwards.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mama Cat
Reviews.Content: It is a good choice! Bigger LCD, better lighting in the dark situation, image quality is better, a lot of functions improved, smaller and easy to carry. Good!

Reviews.Title: Its OK
Reviews.Author: Zbigniew Rodowski "ZbysioR"
Reviews.Content: not bad for the price.  its missing the 3:2 picture size. (that happens to by my favorite). video is pretty good considering its a small photo camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyberific
Reviews.Author: Jay Eckstein
Reviews.Content: Have had an earlier version of the Sony Cyber Shot. Decided to upgrade and just like before.. Great pictures and video. User interface takes gettting used to but figured it out pretty quick. Solid.

Reviews.Title: sony dscwx9 camera
Reviews.Author: David Jones "David"
Reviews.Content: It's fast and taking pictures at night are quick too.  Meaning... some cameras I've used at night, flash, then flash a couple more times them may take the picture.  I guess it's red eye reduction features.  this camera just goes... "click, click" and the pic is good.  No redos because people moved after the first flash... you know what I mean too, right?  I like this camera and for th eprice, it's better than good. David

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Lucy C
Reviews.Content: I love it! easy to use, great size, and panoramic photos are just so easy to take. Great funtions, friendly software.

Reviews.Title: THE QUALITY EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATION!!!
Reviews.Author: Belle
Reviews.Content: Great camera for its price.  I've owned 2 other Canon point and shoot cameras, which was more expensive but this WX9 beats the other 2 in terms of price and quality.  The HDR, background defocus, and soft skin effect is great.  Pictures taken in low light settings are great even without flash.  The in camera guide is very user friendly, each icon is followed by description so you can select the options easily even if you're not a pro.  It doesn't come with cables but it doesn't bother me because I always just stick the memory card in my laptop to load pictures anyways.  Don't compare a point and shoot camera to DSLR cameras, this camera is superior in this price range.  The best point and shoot camera I've used and would definitely recommend this camera!Update:After using it for a few months, I find that playback, deleting items are very slow.  I wish it's more responsive, therefore, I took 1 star off.

Reviews.Title: Downloading Video
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I bought this for it's HD video yet downloading video directly from the camera is impossible ,aside from that the camera is great

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Gabriel R. Castillo "Gabe"
Reviews.Content: Lots of features, captures beautiful pictures and excellent HD movies. Small enough to carry in pockets anywhere, so be ready to snap away!

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Natalia
Reviews.Content: I really loved this camera, takes amazing pictures and it's easy to use! I think it's the best camera i ever had!

Reviews.Title: CANT upload video if you have a Mac!!! :( ...Otherwise good camera.
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: So I bought this camera last month and I have really been enjoying it. The picture quality is crazy good for the price. The only downfall I saw right away was no backlighting so if your using the camera in low light its pretty hard to see the buttons (I think this is common in most camera's though?) so I was willing to overlook it. The deal breaker for me is Ive been trying to figure out why when I upload, It only uploads pictures, no video. After some research I found out, you can take video no problem, but If you own a Mac you cant get your video on to the computer easily, or at all as far as I have found. If your a PC user and never plan on switching this obviously isn't a problem you'll run into. I'm a Apple fankid for sure & I really did like this camera so im pretty disappointed. In all the reviews I saw previous to buying this, there was no mention at all of this issue.. so I thought Id write this review. Ill be returning this ASAP. Looks like I'll be needing a new camera, Im gonna look into the Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with Full 1080p HD Video, hopefully this ones Mac friendly..

Reviews.Title: I am Impressed
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: I've owned several compact cameras in my life, but this wowfor the price i paid (172 us Dollars)Pictures are amazing, at first is kinda hard to use, but in 5 minutes or so you will be taking pictures like a proit comes with pretty amazing features like HDR, background defocus, and when you take pictures in sequence it makesan effect of 3d animated picture with the accelerometerPretty nice cameraI found the battery not so good, but not bad neither, just averageI really recommend this if you want superb pictures, and HD videobetter than canon, nikon and even olympus . Haven't tried samsung but I'm pretty sure sony is better c:

Reviews.Title: Perfect, fantastic, superior!
Reviews.Author: Sasa
Reviews.Content: Perfect, fantastic, superior!!! It takes DSLR quality pictures, 3D pictures and full HD video. User frendly sofware and powerfull hardware. Very easy to handle with and there is useful automatic program switch (scene recognize). Definitely my number one camera!!!

Reviews.Title: sony cyber shot
Reviews.Author: crmanjunath
Reviews.Content: the camera has gud features & functions well. additionally the quality of picture very gud becos of 16 mega pixels & HD is one of the best feature in the camera.

Reviews.Title: A good camera, but didn't work out for MY needs
Reviews.Author: Yarii
Reviews.Content: This camera has some good features - maybe too many if you are looking for something very simple.  If you want to take pictures of fast-moving children I don't think you'd miss a shot...I've owned over 20 digital cameras the last 8 years, and this Sony has the fastest shutter response time of them all.  I was amazed.  The battery lasts a long time.  The HD video quality is awesome, too.Why I returned it:I wanted this camera solely for the background defocus feature; I believe Sony is the only manufacturer that offers this on some of its higher-end point & shoot cameras.  It's a wonderful idea, but rarely worked.  For best results, it could only be used outdoors as the flash is automatically disabled when this is chosen, and then the subject that is being focused has to be 30 cm (almost 1 foot) from the camera for the camera's software to apply the defocus to the background.  75% of the time it did not work, at least it tells you on the screen after you take the picture, so you can try again.My other objective was to take decent pet photos.  I first tried the Scene Mode specifically for Pets.  When those turned out bad, I tried the other settings such as Intelligent Auto and Superior Auto. Nothing was sharp enough, and my post-processing software couldn't do enough to combat the softness of the photo either.  Superior Auto had the best shots of all, but still not as good as I currently get from my 3 year old Panasonic Lumix DMC-LZ8.One feature I don't like is the Mode Dial.  I'm not sure if all Sony cameras have this but if you aren't careful while dialing it up or down and your finger puts too much pressure on any north/south/east/west point on the dial, you can easily change the flash settings by accident, as well as other things.On the plus side, this camera is made in China, but has a good build quality, and even the battery/memory card door is substantial, the zoom motor sounds robust, and the over 900,000+ pixels on the LCD screen - phenomenal!

Reviews.Title: Calificacion
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis
Reviews.Content: Es un vendedor responsable se los recomiendo ya que cumple con las expectativas de un buen proveedor lo que habla mucho de su persona

Reviews.Title: Does an OK job, but could be better
Reviews.Author: boohoo
Reviews.Content: This camera does a good job in good lighting.  The same can be said for any lower-cost point and shoot.  But this one can really fall off the edge when it comes to noise.  Maybe that's becouse with 16mp, you can, just maybe, get some really good detail on just the right shot with just the right lighting.  The camera is just not very consistent shot to shot.  I will say, the macro setting works pretty darn well!  I'm happy with the cam, becouse of it's small size, but I bought it for deployment to Afghanistan.  Had I been buying a camera for more normal use in the states, I would probably have been inclined to pay a little more for CMOS sensor camera, or anything with a little bit better zoom/sensor.I apologize for not having very many cameras to compare this one to, but I think it's about in the middle...nothing spectacular...not all the time, anyways.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera with reasonable price
Reviews.Author: LynnNYC
Reviews.Content: Waited for the deals $150 (with tax) and finally got it last week.Tried it in door, night, lights on, came out good. So happy as our previous camera didn't take good in door low light pictures.This is actually out 3rd Sony Camera. All Sony camera came with same basic features which every body know how to use. I am not savvy tech or photographer, but with this camera I can also take high quality pictures easily .Thanks Amazon for carrying good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Bill G
Reviews.Content: I've got to rate this product well for the cost it is really fantastic, HD Video, 16.2 mega pixels, fantastic quality in high and low light, multiple options, multiple setting for all environments.  Worth every penny. Easy to use. simple. The only negative (and it's not really a negative) but the flash is almost too bright. Trying to figure out how to change that but this camera is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: North valley bridge "north valley bridge"
Reviews.Content: I used to tease my Father that my camera had 16 MP and it is hard to believe it has come true and I am no longer telling tall tales.  Easy to use, great pictures, editable movies...what's not to like.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: V. Ivanov "tech savvy"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my teenage son, who wanted something small and good. This camera is AMAZING and well exceed my expectations! The pics it produces are way better than everything I've seen before, and I have always been proud with my cameras and pictures....I have 3 Canons, fairly new models, (A..., ELF.., SX20). This little toy takes very clear pics, FULL HD videos and very clear pics and videos from fast moving objects(our dogs running for example). It has some new type of sensor, better than anything in this price range(and some..), also many advanced features(like panoramic stitching- it takes many pics of a BIG object and then put them together as 1 big (long)picture...I haven't play with the camera after the first day, but my 19y old son is VERY HAPPY! Can make excellent Christmas present for anybody needing small and good point-and-shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and video, bad zoom
Reviews.Author: Andrew Dobson "ook maven"
Reviews.Content: I'm satisfied with this camera, but if I were to recommend a different camera, I would opt for one with a better zoom. Besides that, tis a fine camera she is.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: runner
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a month ago to take on a trip. I like it's small size, the automatic picture settings, and the quickness in taking pictures. The on-off button is kind of difficult to operate, especially when you're in a hurry. Picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Love it: easy to use, captures clear pictures, panoramas, wide angel lens, HD video, HDR, great low light capability. Great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice one
Reviews.Author: Laukik
Reviews.Content: I feel that this is the best cam I can have within this price range.Just that I was looking forward to have the multipurpose usb cable with it, as it was provided with previous versions of sony cam but instead there was just a normal usb cable.

Reviews.Title: Light & Sweet Camera from Sony...!
Reviews.Author: SANJEEV SUBBARAO
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Still Camera from SOny. My first one was also a Cybershot bought in Malaysia in 2005. Great product, for the price...!!!

Reviews.Title: Surprised by so many options in Such a tiny Camera.
Reviews.Author: Krishna D. Tangutur "krishna"
Reviews.Content: I have a DSLR and this was just a gift to my cousin. Some of the options in this camera are just amazing. Love the 3d photograph mode. For the cost, its a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Drains battery while off
Reviews.Author: B3n S6z
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and the pictures it takes. It's incredible to me that cameras are this compact, this sharp, this fast these days. A few years ago this camera was unthinkable.The only thing I don't love is the fact that the battery goes flat even when the camera is turned off.  It's really annoying to charge it up, put it aside for a few days, and try to turn it on only to discover that the battery is completely discharged. It must have some kind of parasitic power drain for one of its features. I can't figure out if there is anything to configure to prevent this.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Manriman
Reviews.Content: Great camera full of features. Doesn't let the manual user to do much, but that's what it is made for. To be a full automatic camera.Pros: great screen, panorama mode, burst mode, superior auto mode does it everything 95% of the times.Cons: 3d on the camera screen is hard to see.  Haven't tested in a 3d tv. Battery wont last vey long.

Reviews.Title: Beauty
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to make beauty videos and after playing with it for a while I really enjoy this camera! The screen has to be my favorite part, it reminds me of the sony flat screens, the newer ones, because its extremely crisp. Focusing takes a couple seconds from time to time and then there are moments when the focus goes...focus-pocus (it renders beyond the un imaginable). The red doesn't match the image, the red in the image is more pink. When received the red is like a apple red and rusty-ish. I gave it 4/5 because I haven't experienced it too much, I've only had it for a 2 days.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: fernando
Reviews.Content: is a camera with good image and very nice design and good presentation and takes very nice photos, clear and easy to use and design

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: jess
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying the video quality the most! The camera is easy to use and there are loads of options for playing around with your photos!

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera, Good Price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a birthday gift for my girlfriend (who is not very technilogically adapt). It is fairly simple to use, and takes very good quality pictures. The price point was right around where I was looking, so overall I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: G Pad
Reviews.Content: Great camera with amazing features. Not too expensive and very stylish. Will buy another one very soon. I am very happy with this purchase and am very pleased with how quick I received my item.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot WX9 from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Syed Haider Shah
Reviews.Content: WX9 is a fairly new device in the market (came out in March I think) and is good value for the money, considering the style, the size. The best compromise I would say for the money. If you would rather let it decide what's best, I suggest you leave it on intelligent shoot mode. If your target is stationary, then it has something one step further even.Overall, best bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Urzua
Reviews.Content: Very well developed compact camera for the price. It has plenty of settings that make pictures come out great. I recommend this for people who just like to take great shots.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: MReyes
Reviews.Content: Love the shutter speed.  Easy to catch those quick moments, especially with kids or other moving objects. Sleek compact design, great photo quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Mariano
Reviews.Content: It's a great product! Taking into account the price/quality balance I consider that it is one of the best entry level digital cameras.The quality of the lenses and the speed is really great.

Reviews.Title: Jerry B
Reviews.Author: gbaginski
Reviews.Content: Most disappointed that you can not use the highest definition movie mode (AVCHD)with Mac computers.  That was one of the reasons I purchased the Sony DSC-WX9.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Global66
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything as advertised. Excellent picture quality! I've had the camera for over a week and just love it. I really like the panorama mode, but I haven't taken HD video yet

Reviews.Title: Great All around Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: RJGUY
Reviews.Content: I started with the WX1 over a year ago. I found it to be a great camera to put in your pocket and go where ever, when ever. I enjoy photography and always have a camera available. But I do a good deal of video as well. All of it in the AVCH formate of hi - def. The only draw backI found with the WX1 was the lack of AVCH video. Editing video was a bit more involved blending MPeg4 and AVCH. So when Sony introduced the WX9 I bought one.To date despite the few negitives I found written here it's a great camera for both video and still photography. The still photos are supurb at 16meg a pixels. I don't understand comments by some of poor photographs. Mine are perfect! Plus the advanced auto mode results in another option, in additon to the many manual settings available to the photographer.The flash is on the weak side, but let's face it, if you want to shoot somehthing requiring a flash and your beyond 12 feet, a pocket camera won't do it. But on the other hand, the WX's low light capability is excellent, even w/o a tripod. In the low light mode the camera will take multiple pictures and put them together to make a picture. All of this happens in an instant!The zoom lens is only 5 power. But I'll wager that will get you by at least 80% of the time.Then their is the video! Really great hi-def video at the 1080i level. Plus you get the major benefit of optical image stablization for smooth, steady video. I need to point out here - the system in the WX9 is among the best out in the consumer level cameras. So if you tend to be a little shaky when shooting video, this camera will help you.The only reason I gave the cmaera 4 stars in stead of 5 is the use of "slide switches on the back of the camera, and the very small on/off switch on the top of the camera. Sony could have put the standard rotary switch in place of one of the slide switches. This must have been an issue of cost, and perhaps space limitations. Rotary switches tend in my opinion to last longer.All in all it's still a great camera - one that you will not be dissapointed owning. It makes a great single camera or 2nd camera to take along when your primary camera would be too bulky -

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - fast response - good quality pictures
Reviews.Author: BigDumbJerk
Reviews.Content: Good Camera - takes really good pictures and videos.  I really like the panorama option.I cannot seem to get the portrait/background fade thing to work consistantly but that is likely just me...The menu dial thingy that you turn is frustrating at times, but it is not a big deal.  just use the menu button.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: M. T. LAM
Reviews.Content: I bought this after trying that in a local store.  Love how fast between each picture, picture are very clear, love the defoucs feature - looks so professional.

Reviews.Title: A fine P&S;
Reviews.Author: LCT
Reviews.Content: very good design, nice to hold and fit into your pocket easily. Great LCD screen, super fine resolution. Plus 10fps burst, long lasting battery life and full HD movie...this P&S; is simply super!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: Michelle STL
Reviews.Content: This camera takes beautifully clear pictures. Had an Olympus before that did not take good pictures of people. This one is beautiful up close, far away, zoomed in, whatever. Does well in any light situation. I have not played with all the features yet but typically use intelligent auto. It's wonderful!

Reviews.Title: good image, but bad battery life
Reviews.Author: A. talebian "AST"
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is great, price is a little bit high,battery life is the worst i have ever had, thefore, i bought 2 off brands battery on ebay to back it up.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: KLauer
Reviews.Content: For the quick Picture this camera is great. Has alot of features, takes a little bit to figure them out but still a great camera.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a school trip in April and ever since i bought it i have been in love with it. The picture quality i find amazingly clear , some of my pictures look professionally done and I'm so happy. The only problem i have with it is that the replay or look back button on mine is a little slow so its not fast when wanting to look at old pictures. Other than that its quick, light, easy and has a decent battery. I promise if you buy this just to have a camera when needed or for a trip you will love it.

Reviews.Title: READ THIS WARNING ABOUT THE USB CABLE!!
Reviews.Author: Dave Millman "davemill"
Reviews.Content: Other reviewers have said much about the performance of this camera, which is actually very good. I am amazed how much better point-and-shoot cameras get every 6-8 years when I need a new one.However, this camera has a very serious drawback. The USB cable is non-standard AND the cable is not generally available for sale. This means that if you lose the included cable, you are screwed, because you have to contact Sony Parts to try to get a new one. Nothing is available on Amazon, auction sites, etc. Come on, Sony, I can order the most obscure part for my 12-year-old Sony camcorder from multiple sources on the web. Why can't I get this cable?We all wish manufacturers would stop designing non-standard cables just so that they can sell us the replacements. But for Sony to do this WITHOUT making the replacement available is inexcusable.Minus two stars.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Little Machine
Reviews.Author: Hamslam "Hamslam"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Perfect pocket camera for times I can't be bothered to dust off the megapixels of my SLR. Really fantastic low-light images, and the panorama mode (though not as hi-res as the standard images) gets used all the time for often brilliant results. On close inspection the camera seems to post-process low-light images to remove grain, creating a painterly filter effect... but the trade-off is worth it, especially at this size.

Reviews.Title: Great videos but average pictures
Reviews.Author: Chris Raab
Reviews.Content: We have always owned point and shoot Canon's in the past and were very happy with their camera's but we gave the WX9 a try.  I did my research on the internet and read how great it was and how well it performed in low light.  The camera was a Christmas gift for my wife who is mainly a full auto photographer and on paper it met all our needs; great pictures and videos according to many website reviews as well as the reviews on Amazon.The problem I have with the camera is the over saturated and over exposed indoor still pictures.  While I was able to get some descent pictures using various settings, it seems the camera is prone to producing very over exposed pictures in low light situations when the flash is used.  The pictures came out very bright and washed out looking.  Outdoor pictures produced very good detail and rendered the colors more accurately but still slightly strong in the reds and blues.While the still images were questionable, I thought the camera excelled with its outstanding video capabilities.  The videos were very impressive in low light and normal lighting conditions.Also, as others have pointed out, the battery doesn't last long.  I am returning the camera and continuing my research, so it's a good thing I didn't buy the extra battery.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: vini
Reviews.Content: es una camara genial paraa el costo que tiene con respecto a las demas camaras de su genero muy recomendada!!

Reviews.Title: Has most of the desired features
Reviews.Author: Optimist
Reviews.Content: After researching a camera/camcorder combo I settled for this product. I am very happy with the stills and also the 720P HD video.

Reviews.Title: Pure Image quality (very satisfy)
Reviews.Author: Miko
Reviews.Content: received this camera last week,I specially like continuous shoots and video quality.Very Light and small-size,I brought two camera at the same one is sony c-sh csw 370 which is ccd censor,Big different between CMOS and CCD is here Photo is very clear if you taking with zoom though it is only small zoom.Night Shoot is very sharp and clear especially when u captured video. totally different ccd one.

Reviews.Title: Mode selector broke almost immediately
Reviews.Author: matt.greeson
Reviews.Content: This product is shoddily made. The mode selector (the little button that switches back and forth between picture, video, and panorama modes) broke almost immediately. What a waste.

Reviews.Title: fuzzy pictures!!!
Reviews.Author: edu
Reviews.Content: I have a Sony Camera I bought about 8 years ago, it has a smaller lens, and it is only 6 mega pixels and takes better pictures than this camera. Amazingly ugly pictures. I mostly take landscape pictures and they are all fuzzy. I've tried with all the settings and the higher resolutions available and all my pictures really suck. I am going to give this camera away.

Reviews.Title: Nice Point and shoot!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Gotta say, after I ordered I was a bit nervous, reading the (few) negative reviews, as well as some of the tech websites reviews. BUT, turns out any negatives I read were not deal breakers, or I didn't even notice at all. For instance, several reviewers commented on over-saturation of colors. True. But wow, they pop nicely, especially in low light. I took some test shots of our Christmas tree and outside lights, and they're beautiful! Low light performance in general is just amazing (best at the widest angle, no zoom.. zoom does evil things to the low light handling and picture quality, and if this were a DSLR or more expensive camera in general I might bitch :)). Low light photos rock. Color saturation? Meh. Looks terrific to me. Put em both together. Terrific.I also read that some folks thought the battery life sucked, while others thought it was great. Go figure. I bought a second battery, really cheap right here on Amazon, plus a charger for good measure, just in case. I don't expect the world from a thin little sliver of Lithium ion battery anyway, long as I can snap a bunch of pic before I change it out. From my brief testing so far, it looks like the battery will hold up just fine.Okay, shooting modes. Lots of em. Haven't checked out but a few, like background defocus, panorama, intelligent auto, and superior auto. Nice, and all those have worked well in low light too. Movies? played back my cat on HDTV (also in low light btw). Perfect.Some folks carry on about having to buy a memory card. Get over it. Most of these camera's require that, and this one accepts the Sony memory sticks AND SD cards, up to 32MB. Got a Sandisk 8GB class 10 for mine, and I can snap away freely. I figured, why get the minimum requirement for the device? Faster is better, that way I know how well the camera can perform. You can get a LOT of shots on an 8GB card too. If you really need to carry around a thousand shots of your treasured memories without downloading them to your computer once on a while, get a bigger card.Some wit declared that his camera had a plastic tripod mount on the bottom, couldn't believe it was so cheap. Not. Black metal. Duh. Controls too small? Small yes, not unmanageable. That little wheel is a bit tricky, ok, but not horrible. Battery and SD card fit snugly inside a well-designed door that is spring-released and closes securely. Someone complained that the USB port is on the bottom and they couldn't sit the camera upright while downloading photos. Why on earth would you want to? OH, the HDMI cable I got with my Canon camcorder works perfectly with this! Cool, I thought I'd have to buy Sony's, but I don't :)Is this the be-all-end-all Point & Shoot camera that you can buy for less than $200 that will do everything a DSLR does (providing you know how to use the darn thing)? I would personally like to smack anyone who thinks it should be. Get a grip. This is a darn nice camera, and I really like it! For UNDER $150 (actually $139 just after Black Friday) I love it!

Reviews.Title: A pretty decent camera
Reviews.Author: Cho Mama
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about 3 months now and I'm a fan for the most part.  It takes really great photos under good lighting and I absolutely love the option to take photos while recording simultaneously!  Here's a quick pros and cons list:Pros:- Soft Snap is my favorite setting.  It's crisp and makes everyone in the picture look clean and fresh (as if they were wearing makeup!)- Options are easy to find.  The camera overall is very easy to use- It's small and light!  Doesn't feel bulky and has a sleek design.- Gourmet setting is excellent for detailed close-up shots!- Non-flash mode under good lighting creates some fantastic photos!  But you need to have good lighting...- Capture photos while taking videos (AWESOME!!)Cons:- There's a lag when switching from video to photo mode.  Sometimes, it could take several seconds before the camera is ready to take a photo (annoying)- Lag before and after I've taken a photo (will switch to view mode randomly and I have to manually exit out of it.. wth)- Slow to turn off and on (lag, yet again.)- Low light setting is not that great.  Need everyone to stand completely still in order to get a decent shot.  The flash setting is harsh (I generally hate flash mode)- Photos while taking a video are of lower quality- Transferring photos to computer is such a hassle... even after I've deleted it from the SD card, it somehow still remains in my camera and I have to manually delete them.  Very annoying...I'm content for the time being.. the camera gets the job done and seems to be working fine.  I've had really terrible experiences with Sony products and they have terrible customer service.  This will most definitely be my last Sony purchase if it fails... will let you know!

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Hadil
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Camera back on 2011; it works great and the pics are sooooo good. very happy with this Camera until now and recommend it for every one. the price is great for this great Camera.

Reviews.Title: Pics looked Awful
Reviews.Author: HuntersPad
Reviews.Content: Pictures were awful of landscape and trees my phone takes better pics, But the Video was excelent with the Camera but thats the only thing its good for I returned it.

Reviews.Title: I'm in tears
Reviews.Author: Janell "Just DC"
Reviews.Content: The camera died 1year and 2 weeks after I finished paying for it.  I am heart sick.  My old Sony still works but the pictures don't have the sharp, crisp pictures.  My old one went to Ireland and the pics are good.  This one went Maryland and died.  I am so heart sick I am near tears.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Rae
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed in this purchase.  I bought one as a gift and one for myself.  My 6 yr old digital camera and my smart phone takes better pictures than this one does.  I like to point and shoot only.  Actually I wish I had returned both of them but they were bought for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing- good picture quality but breaks way too easily
Reviews.Author: Alena
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 WX9 cameras in the span of 6 months now, and both are now broken.The first one I forgot in a cafe, and was thrilled to have it returned to me when I came back a few hours later. Unfortunately, once I turned it on I saw that the internal LCD screen was cracked. I didn't think much of it, thinking that the camera must've been dropped badly in my absence and that it's my own fault for having forgotten it. Since I was happy with the picture quality and only owned the camera for about 3 months at this point (so no newer models have come out), I went back to the store and bought a second one.Now fast forward 3 more months and I was in a lounge with some friends, and the camera fell out of my purse, which was placed on a LOW LOUNGE CHAIR, no more than a foot off the ground. It was really a very short distance to fall, and there was a carpet on the floor. I immediately picked it up and to my great surprise discovered that the internal LCD screen was cracked again, rendering it unusable! This time I was there to witness the fall, and I have to tell you- having dropped multiple phones in the past and having owned the previous model of Sony Cyber Shot for over 4 years- that camera should not have been broken after that fall.I am very disappointed. I was pleased with the picture quality, but I really don't expect my cameras to break quite as easily as that. So unless you expect to NEVER EVER DROP YOUR CAMERA, not even from a distance of a foot off the ground, don't buy this model. I think there must be some sort of a design flaw.

Reviews.Title: Over exposed and color shifts...
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: I am a long time camera user and have had point and shoots as well as DSLRs with hefty lenses.  I bought this for my g/f but was very disappointed in the picture.  The picture was constantly over-exposed and the color was shifted significantly toward the warm or cool based on what you were shooting.  I even tried HDR mode to try to control the over-exposure but that didn't help.  The interface to the camera was annoying.  The spin wheel is small and it also acts as a button.  Half the time I tried to spin the button (as delicately as I could) but the spin wheel would click anyway sending me off into a menu I didn't want.  I ended up returning the camera.

Reviews.Title: Not Convienent!!
Reviews.Author: Penuna6378
Reviews.Content: The battery dies within a couple uses...when you plug it into your computer to upload pics it stays on even after you disconnect..so you have to be mindful of this and purposefully turn it off whenever it isn't in use.  My Olympus would shut off the second you disconnected it from the USB outlet so this bums me out.  It isn't that user friendly and the shutter button (To take the pics) is so low it is almost flush with the camera.  Not convienent and I would not recommend :(  Mine came with the case and it stinks, also hard to open and close..

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: zg "zgh"
Reviews.Content: Take greatbpics and user friendly. This my second Sony camera best. It's improve alotbsine my first one from d2 yearsnago

Reviews.Title: great investment
Reviews.Author: Sean Park
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift this Christmas for my girlfriend and I almost wish I bought it for myself... I know, am a jerk and a cheap ass.. but I don't mean it literally, Im just emphasizing how good it is, the quality is just astonishing, possibly better than some dslr.. its got every settings includinf 3d panorama and 1080 video.. top that off with a massive 16 mp.. great great investment, very cheap (I bought it for 140 here) and well worth the money.. the only down side is its battery loses its life fairly quickly.. but an extra spare battery should fix that problem

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Jaiminkumar Modi "Jmin"
Reviews.Content: Its a great product. Very easy to use and takes great pictures, specially night pictures. Its very fast and takes minimum time in taking multiple pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: love it!!!!  I actually bought two camera to compare and this one won hands down. This camera I would highly recommend to my friends. thanks.

Reviews.Title: Sony WX9
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my camera. It's a great buy for its price, I advise anyone to get it. It came in exactly when it was projected to arrive with everything that I had ordered in place and functioning perfectly.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: ahmawa
Reviews.Content: It is a nice camera I bought.. I liked it so much..I like its size and services..I like the screen as well..

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: I have been purchasing Cyber-Shot cameras for awhile now and I have always been extremely satisfied with them.  It was just time to upgrade...I love the size of this camera and have no issues accessing the various controls.  I like the numerous features that it has, and I have been testing everything.Another great product from Sony.

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera!
Reviews.Author: mommypick
Reviews.Content: So far, I love this camera.  It's lightweight and relatively easy to use.  I did have a little trouble figuring out how to zoom and review pics, but it's only because I was used to my other camera's set up.  Once I got used to this one, it was a breeze.  the pics are super crisp and clear, so overall I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Niki
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my boyfriend and he loved it! Great picture quality, I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: P E R F E C T
Reviews.Author: Daylook
Reviews.Content: I HAD NO PROBLEMS, ARRIVED IN TIME AS DESCRIBT, IS NEW WORK GOOD, GOOD PRICE, NO WORDS JUST P E R F E C T!!!!

Reviews.Title: just got it and the problems to , right out of box
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: well so far ill talk about problems . Taking videos seem to eat up battery life . playback of said video i have to stick camera in my ear , at full volume , kinda hard to see video that way . after an hour online with A sony tec it got A little better , still not up to sony standards . plugging camera into my sony T.V.using HDMI cable (yes thers a mini cable port in camera) video sound was good along with picture . as of picture indoors  I found to be good  (nothing is great in my book) but shooting from iside to outside autoflash went off ! Lousy picture . so for now , I hope to return camera and pray it has A bad speaker in it . let you know how new one works out . Jim Kaminski .

Reviews.Title: No where do the warranty claim
Reviews.Author: FRANCELINA CONTRERAS M.
Reviews.Content: No where do the warranty claim Fuenciono bad prduct on the first day and the day after an error.Soy cliente de amazon de VENEZEULA desde hace varios años

Reviews.Title: Great Quality photos, love the 3D Panoramic feature
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: for the price this is the best quality of digital camera one can buy.+ pre-flash really works.. no blinking in the photos.+ really like the Panoramic feature+ records HD videos, But do not expect it to focus on small object too fast, for basic home videos is great, but not for James Cameron to shoot Avatar with.Cons:The price may drop again, so if you don't NEED it wait 2 weeks, it might drop $10 more.and NO memory card, but you only need 4 GB

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA, DOES EVERYTHING SO WELL!!!
Reviews.Author: PornStar
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera and I highly recommend it. It is packed with tons of useful features, is user friendly and the ergonomics are great.WHAT'S HOT:-SUPER sharp, bright LCD: 920K pixels! MORE than Iphone's 640K! It is razor sharp, and when you play the images back on the camera, it shows you the image exactly as it was captured. On many cameras the images look good on the camera's LCD but looks blurry or dark on the computer screen, not with this usefully sharp LCD. Just the amazing LCD by itself makes the camera worth it.-Excellent images - Constantly razor-sharp, clean, detailed, and vibrant. Not so soft like Canon. It is a commendable performer in low-light situations and nights shots taken in twilight hand held mode looks awesome.-Stunning video: HD movies look stunning and spectacular with awesome, clear stereo! I made video of a beach on a sunny day with camera on tripod, played on 60" TV. Everyone thought it was recorded with some $3000 JVC professional video camera.-Boxy, slab sided body: easily sits upright and looks professional.-Plastic battery cover: finally a battery cover that feels sturdy! It closes smoothly and effortlessly with assurance and good tactile sensation. Also while it's open, the power stays on so you can switch the memory card without interruption. On the Canon 300HS, the power will shut off if you open the cover.-FLASH times are surprisingly quick.WHAT'S NOT:-Images are a bit noisy at upper ISO. However software will do an amazing job of cleaning them up and enhancing the image, some are free like NeatImage.-Buttons tiny and slow.-Battery life improved over previous W series but still a little short. 2nd battery is recommended-Charging time is annoyingly long. Quick charger is available but it's over priced up the ass like all Sony accessories.-Sony is no longer including an AC brick charger for the battery, which means the battery has to be charged while it's inside the camera, which is annoying. Also Sony no longer includes the AV cable. Both of these accesories I have it from previous W-series which was accidentally damaged and replaced with insurance.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: safana
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed when I figured out that the Memory cart is not in the box and I have to pay extras to get a good one. Beside that, It is a very nice, easy to use camera in this price range. I love the size, shape and all the fitures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: This is the cam that I was expecting, great image quality and also a lot of differents profiles and adjusments that let you take the dreamed pic.I love the blur background function, it creates artistic pics in seconds.Great I recommend it totally

Reviews.Title: Sony Cibershot WX9 camera. (Red}
Reviews.Author: anilD
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it has so many features in one small package at a very reasonable price. But I was disappointed. I struggled with its on/off button and the mechanisms for changing battery/memory card. Further, I found that the white colored letters on red background are somewhat hard to read. It felt like thay will fade over time. Also, the pictures (for a 16.1 sensor) were not particularly outstanding. I did not test any other functions(which could be working very well) because of the dificulties I mentioned above. My advise to the buyer is - before buying, handle the camera, try all the machanical things that you do with the camera,then decide.

Reviews.Title: Broke in 2 months
Reviews.Author: A. Butler
Reviews.Content: I bought july 15 used it a lot but now this morning the lense wont go back in will be contacting amazon and sony to see a complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Broken after 5 months
Reviews.Author: Gary L
Reviews.Content: I do not use this camera very often,  yesterday the lense failed to retract, and will not move. What piece of crab.Donot buy this poor quality product!

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera, but I would not buy it again based solely on the fact that the plug is non-standard, which means you can't use any of your other USB cables with it.  It also does not charge when plugged into the computer.  Combine these two and it's very annoying.  Also, haven't seen any of the 3D pictures actually look 3D when I show them on my TV.

Reviews.Title: Where's the Audio with the Video?
Reviews.Author: Boilermaker Pete
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot. A lot of really neat features in such a small package. BUT when I play back a video on the camera the sound is barely audible. Yes, I have found all of the menu items for maxing the volume but like someone in an earlier review said, you have to virtually stick it in your ear to hear any sound. I know this thing has a speaker. Does anyone else have this problem or do I have a defective unit?

Reviews.Title: ITS A WODERFUL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: MARKUS2011
Reviews.Content: BUY THIS CAMERA FOR HIGH RESOLUTION AND PRICE I HAVE NO PROBLEMS SO FAR AS EXCELLENT TO RECOMMEND THE DETAILED SPECIFICATIONS.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY A SONY CAMERA THEY SUCK!
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: I have had the camera for six months and thought it took decent photos, until it stopped working.  The lense no longer opens.  It is a piece of crap clearly.  I will NEVER buy another Sony product.  Their support and service suck.  They are really useless. I was told that there is no "life expectancy" for the product, so basically it's a piece of garbage and they don't stand behind it.  I will be buying a Cannon or Nikon next time.

Reviews.Title: Great, except for one thing
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "Mark Twain"
Reviews.Content: ...... it doesn't work.I bought this camera a couple of years ago, and it's been a good one for the most part.It's not intuitive (for a mere earthling), but I'm not really a power user. Still, I've missed some great shots due to fumbling around with it.The ugly: It's pocket sized, so I keep it in my pocket. It does have the annoying habit of turning itself on, due to a lack of lock power on button arrangement.When it turns on on your pocket, the lens tries to come out. The lens jams. You now have some $300 worth of junk camera.What's to like about that?Addition: I've got about 2 hours in disassembling the camera by intuition with hhopes of unjamming it. I've not wrecked anything so far, but it's clearly not made to have just anyone do this. Not the way I intended to end up.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: When I got this camera as a gift, I loved it. I carried it to a friend's house in the case and we took some pictures. I put it back in the case to take home with me and when I got home to look at the pictures the screen was cracked from the inside. I had the camera for one day before it broke. I am returning it as a gift and getting my money back. THIS CAMERA IS SO NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY. It takes beautiful pictures but will break on you. I am so disappointed with Sony. You are much better off going with a Nikon or Cannon.

Reviews.Title: darn!
Reviews.Author: NXO
Reviews.Content: Just got this camera for summer trips.  It had a day of not working while in Mexico, but got over that. Yesterday I took my daughter to the airport for china and it was not working!  It won't turn on properly and the lens cover doesn't open.  This is really unfortunate...  when it worked, it took good pictures.  I have the predecessor model that I used so much the battery door is broken.  I have rubber bands to keep the door on & it still works great (now our 'ghetto camera').  So, if it would turn on, I think it would be a great camera.  However, turning on is crucial:)

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Duane
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great pictures and movies.The only problem is the battery, but with me it lasts all day long.

Reviews.Title: re:  Do not recommend
Reviews.Author: NotSoHappyWithSonyCamera
Reviews.Content: 15 days into purchase of this camera, the digital focus went out of whack resulting in blurry pictures!  Luckily it is still under warranty with Sony.  However, they made me pay for secure shipping!  Do not recommend this product to anyone

Reviews.Title: Body is not good. Paint quality is poor.
Reviews.Author: Dipesh Shah
Reviews.Content: -Pictures are good-Video is good-Cemara paint is poor. It has been just one week and the paint is start peeling off.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: David S. Deboer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item to use on a cruse in Feb 2012. Wanted to to try it out so took it to Christmas gathering with my children. Put camera in my pocket but when I got to the party the lcd display had cracked and camera was useless. I have owned 5 sony cameras and have always been happy with quality of them but this one looks like they cut their standards.

Reviews.Title: Soooooo disappointed
Reviews.Author: G. Calhoun
Reviews.Content: I am so sorry I bought this camera. I have worked almost3 days straight with it and have only managed to become completely confused and frustrated.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSCWX9/BBDL
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Not very impressed with it. It is very slow. Memory card provided is not working properly. My previous Sony digital camera was better. Overall I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Douglas J. Wilson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera in a small package.  I wish that it had a better or simpler way for me to learn how to use it.  Right now I have to leave it on the auto setting because I don't have the confidence to change the settings, and small controls and big old fingers don't match too well.  Still I think it is a very nice camera.  My daughter says it takes pretty good video.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed....
Reviews.Author: Britt
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after having a Canon SD for 4 years. The reviews all seemed great on this camera so I got it. I just tried it for a wedding last night and it is NOTHING like my canon was. I had a purple dress on and in all the pictures it looks bright blue. I high recommend getting a canon over this Sony. I will never buy a Sony camera again.

Reviews.Title: Battery only lasts 5 minutes
Reviews.Author: likeamazon
Reviews.Content: The battery is only lasting for 5 minutes. It gets empty in two days max if you don't even touch the camera. The picture may be perfect etc. If you cannot use it, it is useless!!!I also did not have a chance to try it before 30 days. Amazon 30 days period did not work for me this time.  I was in transit to another location and did not have the time. Most local Dept. Stores have 90 days.I had to pay $13 for shipping to have it repaired. It was with Sony Repair Center 5 days ago and they did not even send me a message to let me know. I'll update if I hear or get anything.Oct 23rd 2012 update. After I received the camera back from Sony Repair Center the same issues. Battery drains all by itself. When you need the camera in 2 days after fully charged I can only get one shot if lucky.

Reviews.Title: 16.2 MP is overrated
Reviews.Author: JJLu
Reviews.Content: 16.2 MP is overrated -- I think the optical diffraction from the small lens prevents the camera from rendering a clear image at 16MP level.  The deep data compression (2.5~3.5M file size for 16MP JPG picture) does not help.  I owned three Sony Cyber Shot cameras before (W80, P100 and original P1), and I love them all.  But, sorry Sony, this time I returned the WX7, because the picture is no better than that from my older Sony W80.  BTW, my 7MP W80 generates clear pictures with the JPG file sizes averaged at 2.7~2.9MB.

Reviews.Title: ty amazon
Reviews.Author: burji
Reviews.Content: I'm surprised the team speed amazon.com.Thanks for help!-------------------------------Camera happy, good quality video. The quality of photos is normal. The camera is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Unfriendly PC Interface
Reviews.Author: Sejo Sudic
Reviews.Content: Very unfriendly  interface to  computer...When  connected  to USB Windows unable to detect  device...requires special  program (PMB)+ SP3 + MS hotfix for WXP...

Reviews.Title: Don't try it
Reviews.Author: Jeff Wood
Reviews.Content: There are two main problems.  SONY and AMAZON.I purchased the older Cybershot a little over a year ago.  Just over a year.  It no longer works.  I am attempting to get SONY to repair this at my cost - out of warranty.  It's like working with 2nd graders.  Many 2nd graders could provide a more compelling business case than SONY can.  The web site is a mess - circular - and the folks in India who answer the phones don't know what SONY is.... or, its products are - nor, do they really care if they help you at all.  So, when you look at this camera - you may consider a different manufacturer.  One that has its act together.AMAZON follows this up with an equally interesting sales pitch when I asked about accessories.  The older Cybershot and the newer Cybershot take all new accessories...  batteries - adapters etc.  Another negative on SONY.  AMAZON says - if it isn't sold as a package - "go to[...] - there you will be able to find information [and purchase] accessories" for the newer Cybershot.WOW!Nice job SONY and AMAZON.  A match made in cyber mayhem.

Reviews.Title: I should have gotten this sooner
Reviews.Author: Dravin
Reviews.Content: I just got it today and the only regret is that I didn't buy this sooner. It doesn't come with a memory card which didnt bother me because I have 2 memory cards from my PSP's which since they are SONY brands work just as well.

Reviews.Title: software disaster
Reviews.Author: Reil
Reviews.Content: DSCWX9I purchased this camera to move up to higher quality (16mp) photos and higher quality video.  As an amature photographer and videographer, I have my prefered software on the computer, and prefer to use simple "explore" methods to find my files and edit.  I found the "required" software programs that come with this camera to be an unmitigated disaster for someone who does not want to clutter their PC with vendor programs.Downloading took "forever" to conduct, and then "convert" the files to a standard format for editing.  While the final result was more than acceptable, I believe that neither my life span nor my patience will permit the forced use of this manufacturer's software.I returned the camera after 1 week of use and trial/error with the software.While the quality of the 16+ mp convinced me to definitely "move up", it won't be with this camera, for sure.

Reviews.Title: too bad!!!
Reviews.Author: IPHOTO MAN
Reviews.Content: How can Sony sell a camera in the USA (that is a point and shoot camera) that will be used by so many IMAC owners with IPHOTO, that is not compatible with direct downloading to IPHOTO with a simple USB cord????????? It would be nice to have that info when reviewing the plus and minus regarding features since IPHOTO is in such use in this country!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Quality but iPhoto Issue
Reviews.Author: scphoto
Reviews.Content: Quality pictures and video. It is relatively fast for a point and shoot with little lag time. However, as of this date, it does not automatically get movie files imported to iPhoto. No problem with photos for import. I need to manually open iMovie, select import from camera, and then import to iMovie. Final Cut Express did not recognize the camera.
